div1.p: Waldo requests that two freedmen be compensated as payment due them has been delayed.

div1.head:
Bureau RF and AL 4th Div 9 Sub Dist Col Jno W. Jordan
Asst Sub Asst Comr
Lexington Va.
div1.p: The transportation for Eliza King (c) from Chattanooga to this place to be procured with the money ($15 00 ) placed in your possession by Candis Payne (colored) within twenty (20) days after giving you the same, has not yet been received. As so long a time has Elapsed since giving her your receipt (Aug 22) for the money, Candis Payne is fearful the transportation will never Come to hand & she, therefore, requests that you return her the money ($15 00 ) without delay. I will not turn over the money to her until I procure the receipt held by her, which I will forward to you.

The money ($12 or $14) due Hdry Holland (colored) by the R. R. C. which amt was collected by you while in Richmond last & forwarded by the RRC to your address in Lexington, has not yet been received. Please forward the same as soon as possible as he is greatly concernedabout it.
